content: DSH 700-22 ATC 12 Battery-powered cut-off saw Versatile rear-handle battery cut-off saw, for cutting up to 4-3/4 with 12 blades in concrete, masonry, and metal (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Concrete saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Matching power-class – our second generation offers improved power to help match the performance and feel of a 70cc gas cut-off saw, all without the fumes, noise, or high vibration rate Advanced safety features – new 3D Active Torque Control (ATC) stops unexpected saw kickback in under 1 second, and fast-acting blade brake stops the blade in ≤ 4 seconds after releasing the trigger Longer trigger time – cuts up to 30% more than a full tank of gas with four B 22-255 Nuron batteries and 300mm SPX univ. A cordless-optimized blades (see technical data below) Push button start – green LED power button indicates whenever the tool is ON and automatically turns the tool OFF after 1 minute Versatile handling – weighing 29.7 lbs (with two B 22-255 batteries and a 300 mm blade), this cut-off saw can be used for both ground-facing and front-facing applications Applications Construction work – cutting out openings in brick or concrete walls Metalwork – cutting steel profiles, pipes and steel sheets Laying paving – cutting curbstones and paving slabs to size Masonry work – cutting bricks and blocks to size Floor construction – cutting expansion joints in fresh concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA:Base materials: All types of concrete and brick, All types of masonry (hollow brick, limestone, etc), Asphalt, Steel, MasonryProtection class: IEC Battery operatedWork environment: Interior and Exterior Technical Data | Base materials | All types of concrete and brick, All types of masonry (hollow brick, limestone, etc), Asphalt, Steel, Masonry | Protection class | IEC Battery operated | Work environment | Interior and Exterior | Arbor Size | Option 1 : 1 in; Option 2: 20 mm | A-weighted emission sound power level | 107 dB (A) | 1 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3955834 - DSH 700-22 ATC + 12 SPX Univ A - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-22 ATC Battery cut-off saw - 1x D60 Flange kit - 1x Dia blade 12x1 SPX univ A - 3955835 - DSH 700-22 ATC + 12 SPX AC-D Cordl - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-22 ATC Battery cut-off saw - 1x D60 Flange kit - 10x Cutting disc AC-D 12 GS/ST SPX cordl. - 3955836 - DSH 700-22 ATC + 12 SPX Metal - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DSH 700-22 ATC Battery cut-off saw - 1x D60 Flange kit - 1x Cutting disc 12x1 SPX metal
